ui::​Button

This is a typical button. It optionally supports setting an ICON for the start of the button.

Functions
Button
Button(
int x,
y,
w,
h,
string t
): Widget(x,y,w,h):
Parameters
x
int

x coordinate of top left corner of button

y
int

y coordinate of top left corner of button

w
int

the width of the button

h
int

the height of the button

t
string

the text label for the button

set_justification
void set_justification(
Text::JUSTIFY j
):

sets the alignment of the text of the button. j is one of ::LEFT, ::CENTER or ::RIGHT
